content.question: The imaginative reinterpretation of spiritual traditions presented in the work is most similar to

choices.label: Ai Weiwei’s Kui Hua Zi (Sunflower Seeds)

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
